message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good start.
Your turn Alice, let's speed things up. How about this?
Come on, Bob, meet me in the middle, 58-42 is fair.
Time is running out, Alice. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. 56-44 is my new proposal.
Okay, Alice, you drive a hard bargain.  Let's settle this before the money shrinks any further.
